text: hello and welcome to cupcake addictions
hot chocolate teacup cupcake tutorial
where I'll be showing you how to make

I've used milk chocolate we microwave
that for just a couple of minutes at
30-second intervals until it's
completely melted that gives us this

like chocolate but it doesn't crack like

like frosting when people bite through

a really nice flat top on these I only
filled them to half way so you can see
that I filled them there to just the
halfway mark and as they rose they came
up the cupcake not quite to the top and
we've got about a centimeter or so gap

didn't think they looked as authentic
and whole marshmallows were a bit too

you'll get two hot chocolates out of

the ganache will actually set reasonably

get down to that nice running spoon

how I'm just using my spoon just to tap
down that ganache and make sure that
it's going right to the edges and into

we're simply going to take a little half

position that one in as well add our
